shinysurveyjs 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Database Operations Class

db_ops.Rd

R6 Class for managing database operations related to survey data storage and retrieval using PostgreSQL.

Public fields

session_id

Character. Unique identifier for the current session

pool

Pool object. Database connection pool

Methods

Public methods

  • db_ops$new()

  • db_ops$create_survey_data_table()

  • db_ops$check_table_exists()

  • db_ops$execute_db_operation()

  • db_ops$update_survey_data_table()

  • db_ops$clone()

Method new()

Initialize a new db_ops instance

Usage

db_ops$new(pool, session_id)

Arguments

pool

Database connection pool

session_id

Session identifier

Returns

A new db_ops object

Method create_survey_data_table()

Create a new survey data table

Usage

db_ops$create_survey_data_table(survey_name, data)

Arguments

survey_name

Character. Name of the survey

data

data.frame. Survey data to be stored

Returns

Character. Name of the created table (invisible)

Method check_table_exists()

Check if a table exists in the database

Usage

db_ops$check_table_exists(table_name)

Arguments

table_name

Character. Name of the table to check

Returns

Logical indicating if table exists

Method execute_db_operation()

Execute a database operation with appropriate connection handling

Usage

db_ops$execute_db_operation(operation, error_message)

Arguments

operation

Function. The database operation to execute

error_message

Character. Error message if operation fails

Returns

Result of the database operation

Method update_survey_data_table()

Update existing survey data table with new data

Usage

db_ops$update_survey_data_table(survey_name, data)

Arguments

survey_name

Character. Name of the survey

data

data.frame. New survey data to append

Returns

Character. Name of the updated table (invisible)

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

db_ops$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
